response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above the market average. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at $750,000. We understand that the true value might be subjective and varies based on specific needs and applications within your organization. Our aim is to make this opportunity accessible while ensuring a fair return for our investment. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 750000}
